xtrememp.playlist

Class PlaylistIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtrememp.playlist.PlaylistIO

  • public final class PlaylistIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Playlist input/output utility. This class provides static utility methods for loading and saving playlist. It support .m3u and .pls playlist format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlaylistIO() 

    • Method Summary

      Load playlist in M3U format.
      protected static java.util.List<PlaylistItem> loadPLS(java.lang.String location)
      Load playlist in PLS format.
      protected static java.util.List<PlaylistItem> loadXSPF(java.lang.String location)
      Load playlist in XSPF format.
      static boolean saveM3U(Playlist playlist, java.lang.String location)
      Saves playlist in M3U format.
      static boolean saveXSPF(Playlist playlist, java.lang.String location)
      Saves playlist in XSPF format.
